observation: Home - Relai  Skip to content About Private Business Help 4.6 4.5 Get started Made in Switzerland TAKE YOUR Buy Bitcoin instantly and hold your own keys with ease and simplicity. Join 100,000 others using Relai and start your Bitcoin journey. Rated “Excellent” with 4.4/5 on Trustpilot As seen in Fast Buy Bitcoin instantly using bank transfer, credit cards as well as Apple Pay and Google Pay. Easy Buy and sell Bitcoin with ease and simplicity. No fees, no extra charges. Safe Grow your Bitcoin portfolio in your own non-custodial wallet. Your keys, your coins. Minutes 01 Choose your amount Input the amount of money you want to invest. You can start with as little as 25 EUR/CHF and go all the way up to 1’000 CHF per day and 100’000 CHF per year. 02 Pick your rhythm Select how often you want to purchase Bitcoin. Make a single buy or set up a weekly or monthly auto-invest plan. 03 choose payment method Pick out of bank transfer, credit, or debit card as well as Apple Pay or Google Pay. 04 Confirm and earn Go to your banking app and create a bank transfer if you chose bank transfer. Finish the payment if you picked a different method. Make sure to add your referral code (if you have one). Bitcoin for everyone Relai offers a solution for both beginners and experts Relai Buy Bitcoin instantly and hold your own keys Buy Bitcoin instantly with an easy and simple user interface Pay with bank transfer to credit cards, debit cards or Apple Pay and Google Pay Create auto-invest plans to stack sats on a weekly or monthly basis Learn more Trade large amounts of Bitcoin with personal support Exclusive service for investors looking to trade with large volumes (100k+ CHF) A dedicated single point of contact for all your Bitcoin investment needs Best price and execution via 35+ trading venues Buy Bitcoin as a company with personal support For small to medium-sized businesses who want to add Bitcoin to their balance sheets Expert guidance from the Relai team, a Swiss company focused solely on Bitcoin Acquire Bitcoin in less than 24 hours 0% ZERO-FEE Yes, that’s right: You can buy Bitcoin with 0% fees. Once a month, up to 100 EUR/CHF per order. YOUR KEYS, The Relai app comes with a non-custodial Bitcoin wallet. This gives you, and only you, total control of your Bitcoin. BUY BITCOIN Buy Bitcoin using EUR or CHF without registration. Choose from a wide range of payment options. Auto-Invest Buy Bitcoin automatically every week or every month without the stress of timing the market. INVITE FRIENDS, EARN BITCOIN Invite your friends to Relai – they will save 20% on fees, you receive up to 50% revenue share, paid in Bitcoin! Lightning quick The Relai app has now non-custodial Lightning enabled in the wallet. This allows you to send transactions at the speed of light with very little cost. 21 Bitcoin Basics Learn the basics about Bitcoin, one email daily Everything you need to know to get started with Bitcoin Put together by Relai’s editorial team Subscribe now Mike the @miketheknight21 Received my first #Bitcoin transaction with @Relai_ch. Easy to use, easy to stack! Recommend this App and Support RELAI! Appreciated this simple using piece of Software! App 340k+ 110k+ Active 320M+ Total USD Relai is an SRO member (Self Regulatory Organisation) of VQF (Verein Qualitätssicherung Finanzwesen). Relai is a Swiss licensed financial service provider are fully compliant with Switzerland’s Anti-Money Laundering Act. Our Investors Please select your preferred language English Deutsch Français Italiano THIS WEEK IN BITCOIN Weekly Bitcoin news, delivered straight to your inbox. By subscribing, you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions. You can unsubscribe at any time. SCAN QR CODE AND GET THE RELAI APP. Open your smartphone camera and point it to the QR code, click on the link generated to download the app. Buy Bitcoin Relai App Relai Private Relai Business Relai Donations Earn Bitcoin Referral Affiliate Learn Our Free Ebook Newsletter Blog Podcast Bitcoin Whitepaper About Relai About Us Career Media & Press Investor Relations Partners Buy Our Merch © Relai. All Rights Reserved. Legal Notice Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions Our website uses cookies We’re not talking about the crunchy, tasty kind. These cookies help us keep our website safe and give you a better experience. By using our website and services, you consent to our use of cookies, which is described in more detail in the Continue More Information

thought: The WHOIS information indicates that the domain is registered to Relai AG, a company based in Switzerland, which aligns with the website's claims. The domain was created on February 11, 2021, and has a registration period until February 11, 2026. This suggests a level of stability and commitment to the domain, which is a good sign. The contact details are redacted for privacy, which is common practice. However, no suspicious activity is reported in the WHOIS data. I should now verify the security of the website by checking the SSL certificate and then look for any reviews or mentions of the website on social media or other platforms.

thought: The SSL certificate information shows that certificates were issued by Let's Encrypt, a well-known certificate authority, and are valid. This indicates that the site has taken measures to secure communication with its users. The certificates are for a subdomain related to development (vault.dev.relai.app), which suggests active development and possibly a test environment for the main website. It's not uncommon for businesses to have separate development environments. To further assess the website's legitimacy, it would be helpful to look for social proof or user opinions on external platforms.

thought: The search results show that there are multiple reviews on Trustpilot and other platforms about the Relai app, with users sharing their experiences. The presence of several positive reviews, along with detailed user experiences, hints at the authenticity of the service offered by the website. The reviews do not indicate any fraudulent activity and suggest that the app is operational and providing a legitimate service. Based on all the information gathered, it seems that the site is legitimate. There are no unusually low prices or claims of free products, the company exists and is registered in Switzerland, the payment methods are common for the type of service offered, and there is positive social proof indicating the site's reliability. I now know the final answer The URL https://relai.app/ does not appear to be a fraudulent site.
